name: Tiki Towers for iPad
description:
Game Description:
WINNER “Best Casual Game” – 5th Annual International Mobile Game Awards 2009

MORE FROM THE CRITICS on the iPhone version:
Pocket Gamer, Gold Award 9/10: “Tiki Towers builds a bridge between thoughtful puzzle play and casual cartoon antics. It’s an utter delight, bearing the fruit of a great game.”

Appcraver.com: “As physic-based puzzlers go, Tiki Towers is one of the best. It’s among my current favorites…”

TouchArcade.com: “…the gameplay proved both engaging and challenging from the start. The overall graphics and cute monkey animations give the game a nice feel of polish.”

Modojo.com: “…Tiki Towers stand out as one of the iPhone’s most unique puzzlers. The fact that it has a bunch of crazy monkeys and bananas is a bonus.”

Save the monkeys! Only you can lead them to safety in this amazing new puzzle game featuring construction, destruction and problem-solving!

Travel between five tropical islands, leading your tribe of monkeys to safety by building bridges and towers out of bamboo, coconuts, and vines. If you're not careful, your structures will collapse and your monkeys will perish. Clear all the levels to acquire the ceremonial masks of an ancient tribe and discover their mythical lost treasure. Tiki Towers is action and puzzle gaming at its best!

FEATURES
• 6 different islands and 54 challenging levels
• Build bridges and towers using bamboo, coconuts and vines
• Realistic physics - bamboo structures will bend, break, and collide with the environment
• Superb graphics and hilarious sound effects take full advantage of your iPad

Highly recommended for fans of World of Goo, Enigmo and Fantastic Contraption.

GameHouse Guarantee: We take pride in the loyalty and trust our customers show us when they purchase a GameHouse product. If you are not completely satisfied with your recent purchase, please contact us at iphone-games@real.com.
